title: What Drink to Order a Gamer - Follow the Liter
description:
Welcome to our newest show Follow the Liter, where we teach you how to make fancy drinks that will impress your friends. This week, the Naughty Dog!

Get a cocktail named after you here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Erick - http://twitter.com/castrodisiac

Music by Tonedeff: https://twitter.com/tonedeff

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] what's up guys welcome to follow the leader the show where we teach you how to make super cool drinks to impress your friends now I'm Tim Gettys I can't impress anybody so I'm here with Eric Castro Master bartender to teach you a thing or two happy to be here man thank you very much so here's the deal Eric I'm the pure one everyone at home knows that I like my Mexican Coke what type of drink can I order that tastes like soda cuz I'm not a big alcohol guy this cocktail is called The Naughty Dog The Naughty Dog wow so first start with the glass uhhuh you add 1 oz of Kala o and a half of some tasty [Music] rum fill this tasty mixture up with some ice m I'm just going to top it off with some root beer arguably the world's greatest beer super easy so far what do you think man too easy I'm super into this yeah then we're going to float a little bit of cream on top floating the cream you want to go it's good to drink right now but I recommend um hit it with a little bit of fresh

I'm super into this yeah then we're going to float a little bit of cream on top floating the cream you want to go it's good to drink right now but I recommend um hit it with a little bit of fresh nutmeg on top damn bam tossing that nut up make like it ain't nothing right here we have the Naughty Dog there you go man let me know what you think okay let's do it that tastes like a root beer float now I'm a huge fan of root beer floats they might be better than soda cuz they are soda and ice cream two things I love together in one nice little nut maky piece of goodness go and give it a stir Stir It Up kind of let all those textures get together and it goes down like a root beer float woo let's do this it's too easy well thanks so much Eric thanks for having me if you guys want to check out this man's bars go to ply Provisions or boiler maker in San Diego or New York respectively also you got a special deal for us yeah if you'd like me to come up with a craft cocktail made specifically for

man's bars go to ply Provisions or boiler maker in San Diego or New York respectively also you got a special deal for us yeah if you'd like me to come up with a craft cocktail made specifically for you go to patreon.com kindof funny guys they will name this drink after you and actually sell it in real bars that's pretty damn cool what else is cool is you guys leaving a comment down below letting us know what you think about this video and all the rest of the videos we make keep coming back to kind of funny.com for a lot more until next time this guy's Eric Castro I'm Tim Gettys and you are [Music] awesome
